meta.name: boiler-deploy
meta.description: Automated VPS deployment with Ansible - Multi-server management

inventory.name: production
inventory.inventory:
all:
  children:
    webservers:
      hosts:
        production-web-01:
          ansible_host: YOUR_SERVER_IP_1
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
          app_port: 3002

inventory.name: dev
inventory.inventory:
all:
  children:
    webservers:
      hosts:
        dev-web-01:
          ansible_host: YOUR_DEV_IP
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
          app_port: 3002

inventory.name: production-multi
inventory.inventory:
all:
  children:
    webservers:
      hosts:
        production-web-01:
          ansible_host: YOUR_SERVER_IP_1
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
          app_port: 3002
        production-web-02:
          ansible_host: YOUR_SERVER_IP_2
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
          app_port: 3003
    dbservers:
      hosts:
        production-db-01:
          ansible_host: YOUR_DB_IP
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
    monitoring:
      hosts:
        production-monitoring-01:
          ansible_host: YOUR_MONITORING_IP
          ansible_user: root
          ansible_port: 22
          ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3
          ansible_ssh_private_key_file: /home/basthook/.ssh/Hosting
          ansible_become: yes
      vars:
        prometheus_targets:
          - targets:
              - 'YOUR_SERVER_IP_1:9100'
              - 'YOUR_SERVER_IP_2:9100'
              - 'YOUR_DB_IP:9100'
            labels:
              job: 'node_exporter'
          - targets:
              - 'YOUR_SERVER_IP_1:3002'
              - 'YOUR_SERVER_IP_2:3003'
            labels:
              job: 'nodejs_app'
